available.description: You can enable any of the following compliance modules to control who can access your asset.
available.title: Available Modules

configured.description: Compliance modules that have been enabled for your asset.
configured.title: Enabled Modules

compliance.description: Enable and configure compliance modules to control who can access your asset
compliance.title: Compliance Modules

form.description: Configure your {{type}} by providing the basic information below.

cap.description: The maximum number of tokens that can be issued
cap.label: Token Cap

countryCode.description: Choose where your asset will be registered
countryCode.label: Country

decimals.description: Number of decimal places for the token (0-18, default is 18)
decimals.label: Decimals

faceValue.description: The face value of each bond token
faceValue.label: Face Value

isin.description: The ISIN of the token. This is an optional unique identifier for the token in the financial system.
isin.label: ISIN (Optional)

managementFeeBps.description: Management fee in basis points (100 BPS = 1%)
managementFeeBps.label: Management Fee (BPS)

maturityDate.description: The maturity date of the bond
maturityDate.label: Maturity Date

name.description: The name of the token. This is used to identify the token in the UI and cannot be changed after creation.
name.label: Name

symbol.description: A short symbol for the token (usually 3-5 characters)
symbol.label: Symbol

type.description: Select the type of asset you want to create. Only asset types with deployed factories are available.
type.label: Asset Type

underlyingAsset.description: The Ethereum address of the underlying asset
underlyingAsset.label: Underlying Asset

form.title: Create {{type}}

messages.loading-description: Please wait while we fetch the available token factories.
messages.no-asset-types-description: No token factories have been deployed yet. Please deploy token factories first before creating tokens.

streaming-messages.no-result-error: No transaction hash received from {{type}} creation.

verification.confirm-description: Please verify your identity to create your digital asset.

wizard.description: We'll guide you through each step to create your tokenized asset with built-in regulatory compliance and investor protection.

asset-type.description: Choose the type of token you want to create
asset-type.title: Select Token Type

assetBasics.description: Set the fundamental properties and details that define your asset
assetBasics.title: Define your Asset

complianceModules.description: Set up compliance modules to ensure your asset meets legal requirements
complianceModules.title: Configure Compliance

selectAssetType.description: Select the type of real-world asset you want to tokenize on the blockchain
selectAssetType.title: Choose your Asset Type

summary.description: Confirm and deploy your compliant digital asset to the blockchain
summary.title: Review & Deploy

token-details.description: Configure the basic properties of your token
token-details.title: Token Details

wizard.title: Design your Asset
